metadata.title: CVE-2021-32920 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Prosody before 0.11.9 allows Uncontrolled CPU Consumption via a flood ofSSL/TLS renegotiation requests.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32920` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

prosody - 0.12.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: prosody package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.12.1-1').
